snippet: In speeches and television interviews, the former defense secretary has made frequent remarks about President Obama’s response to the use of chemical weapons against Syrian civilians.
abstract: In speeches and television interviews, the former defense secretary has made frequent remarks about President Obama’s response to the use of chemical weapons against Syrian civilians.
